de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.homescreen

Class NewGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.BaseController
      • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.homescreen.NewGameController

  • public class NewGameController
extends BaseController
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert The NewGameController is responsible for creating new games (Spielrunden / Spieldefinitionen). The NewGameController can be accessed from the HomescreenController.
